properties.name: stubrunner.minPort
properties.description: Min value of a port for the automatically started WireMock server.

properties.name: stubrunner.maxPort
properties.description: Max value of a port for the automatically started WireMock server.

properties.name: stubrunner.repositoryRoot
properties.description: The repository root to use (where the stubs should be downloaded from).

properties.name: stubrunner.ids
properties.description: The ids of the stubs to run in "ivy" notation ([groupId]:artifactId:[version]:[classifier][:port]).

properties.name: stubrunner.classifier
properties.description: The classifier to use by default in ivy co-ordinates for a stub.

properties.name: stubrunner.username
properties.description: Repository username.

properties.name: stubrunner.password
properties.description: Repository password.

properties.name: stubrunner.stubsPerConsumer
properties.description: Should only stubs for this particular consumer get registered in HTTP server stub.

properties.name: stubrunner.consumerName
properties.description: You can override the default spring.application.name of this field by setting a value to this parameter.

properties.name: stubrunner.stubsMode
properties.description: Pick where the stubs should come from.

properties.name: stubrunner.idsToServiceIds
properties.description: Mapping of Ivy notation based ids to serviceIds inside your application.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.delegate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable DiscoveryClient's Stub Runner implementation.

properties.name: stubrunner.stream.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Cloud Stream.

properties.name: stubrunner.integration.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Integration.

properties.name: stubrunner.camel.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Apache Camel.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.branch
properties.description: Branch to check out for the git repository.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.username
properties.description: Git repository username.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.password
properties.description: Git repository password.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.commit-message
properties.description: Commit message when updating stubs in the git repository.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.no-of-attempts
properties.description: Number of attempts to push changes to the git repository.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.wait-between-attempts
properties.description: Wait time in ms between attempts to push changes to the git repository.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.git.ensure-git-suffix
properties.description: Whether to ensure the .git suffix is appended to the repository URL.

properties.name: stubrunner.properties.stubs.find-producer
properties.description: Whether to find the producer from the stubs protocol path.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.amqp.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable support for Stub Runner and AMQP.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.amqp.mockCOnnection
properties.description: Whether to enable support for Stub Runner and AMQP mocked connection factory.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.consul.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Consul.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.delegate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable DiscoveryClient's Stub Runner implementation.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Spring Cloud support for Stub Runner.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.eureka.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Eureka.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.loadbalancer.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner's Spring Cloud Load Balancer integration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.stubbed.discovery.enabled
properties.description: Whether Service Discovery should be stubbed for Stub Runner. If set to false, stubs will get registered in real service discovery.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.cloud.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Zookeeper.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.integration.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Integration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.stream.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Cloud Stream.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.jms.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring JMS.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.kafka.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Kafka.

properties.name: spring.cloud.contract.stubrunner.kafka.initializer.enabled
properties.description: Whether to allow Stub Runner to take care of polling for messages instead of the KafkaStubMessages component. The latter should be used only on the producer side.
